pages.text: The miraculouses, while very strong, also experience slow degradation. Once a miraculous gets to 0 durability, $(bold)you won't be able to transform$(). A miraculous has $(bold)128$() transformations before it's too damaged.

In order to fix a miraculous, you first must get a $(item)Crucible$(), which must be placed under lava, fire, or any campfire.$(br2)$(italic)Dust from the sky, now precious, will fix the wings of the injured animal. Combine the molten $(item)gold$(nocolor) with the $(item)meteorite powder$(nocolor), then add$():
$(t:Meteorite Powder)$(item)$(italic)Dust from the sky$() is a really rare item, as it's crushed fine meteorite. You cannot find them out in the wild, instead you have to buy it from cartographers.
